text: nam enniyiruntal (nam) attatcikalin karanamaka avanai nam uyarttiyiruppom. Eninum, avan ivvulaka valkkaiyai nirantaram ena enni tan (carira) iccaiyaip pinparrivittan. Avanutaiya utaranam oru nayin utaranattai ottirukkiratu. Ninkal atait turattinalum nakkait tonkavittuk kolkiratu. Atai(t turattatu) vittuvittalum nakkait tonkavittuk kolkiratu. Ituve, nam vacanankalaip poyyakkum (marra) makkalukkum utaranamakum. Akave, avarkal cintittu nallunarcci peruvatarkaka iccarittirattai (atikkati) otik kanpiyunkal
